message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper focuses on human recognition using point clouds captured by LiDAR and proposes an automatic labeled sequential data generation pipeline for human segmentation and velocity estimation. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves robotics (cs.RO) as it deals with LiDAR data and pedestrian detection, and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI) as it uses deep neural networks for human recognition. Finally, the paper also involves graphics (cs.GR) as it generates realistic artificial data using a precise human model and reproduces a precise motion.
